BR_text.BRsummary: Typo in CLI for Packaging prevents creating meta
BR_text.BRdescription:
This just seems like a typo in the CLI from the new system for error messages and warnings. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/blob/master/spacy/cli/package.py#L97>This line </denchmark-link>
  should have a title of .
 Right now it throws an error because Messages.Mo46 isn't defined.

comments_0.comment_text:
Arghhhhhh 🤦‍♀️ Sorry about that. Would you mind submitting a quick PR for this?
 We should also run some clever search / linting to make sure there aren't any other typos like this anywhere that aren't caught by our tests or flake8 sanity checks (which only check for undefined names, not invalid class attributes).

comments_1.comment_text: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
